files.patch:
@@ -2552,1 +2552,1 @@
-  // If changed AndI/AndL inputs, check RShift users for "(x & mask) >> shift" reordering
+  // If changed AndI/AndL inputs, check RShift users for "(x & mask) >> shift" optimization opportunity

@@ -28,1 +28,1 @@
- *          is a constant, should be reordered to "(x >> shift) & (mask >> shift)"
+ *          is a constant, should be transformed to "(x >> shift) & (mask >> shift)"
@@ -60,1 +60,1 @@

\ No newline at end of file
+}
